meanings.definition: A type of large, heavily armed ship used in the Mediterranean in the 16th and 17th centuries.
meanings.sent1: The galliasses sailed majestically across the sea.
meanings.sent2: The fleet consisted of several galliasses ready for battle.
meanings.sent3: The galliasses decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The galliasses stood tall like ancient giants on the water.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the galliasses struck fear into the enemy's hearts.
